document_data.name: Quirish
document_data.subgroup:
[[Southern Imaskari languages|Southern Imaskari]]
[[Eastern Imaskari languages|Eastern Imaskari]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Quirish''' was a tribal language of the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Description: The grammar of Quirish had a subject–object–verb order. Long I and E vowels were drawn out. Consonants, especially its Ks, were harsh. The language was nasal, and Ls were also aspirated.
document_data.Script: Quirish did not have a written script.<ref name=D:SiT-p29>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}}
document_data.History: Scholars classified Quirish both as an [[Eastern Imaskari languages|Eastern]] and as a [[Southern Imaskari languages|Southern Imaskari language]].<ref name=D:SiT-p29 /> It was strongly influenced by [[Muhjuri]] and by the [[Shou Chiang languages]] of [[Shou Lung]].
